entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -42.6°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -46.7°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog at times this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
